findings.rationale: A five-year confidentiality period may be considered lengthy, potentially leading to challenges in enforcing the NDA after such an extended time.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond can expose the Receiving Party to immediate and potentially unfair restrictions without a financial safeguard.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment without consent could hinder business flexibility and may complicate mergers or acquisitions.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
